amzbooks.title: Book Release: The Girl on the Train: A Novel by Paula Hawkins
amzbooks.topComment: Best Hitchcock style mystery of voyeuristic observation since Rear Window. - Rachel is a woman who considers herself worthless. She feels that women are only valued for two things: their looks and their role as a mother. She is barren and rather plai...
